Articles.Content:
Hello everybody!

It's my turn to say "hello" to you, kind and helpful KSP community! It's not usual... I mean, I test a lot of indie (and mainstream) games since a loooot of time (I was a

(video inside), that will give you an idea when I began to play PC video games...

But that's not the point... I just wanted to say that Kerbal Space Program si, by far, on of the best video game discovery in the last decade. Fun, addictive, educational, frustrating... you got a masterpiece squad! (Note: sorry for the mistakes; english is not my native language). As a journalist... I had the opportunity to discover a lot of start-ups, but your product is really promising. I hope that you'll continue in that direction and that your project will, once finished, be as cool as it should be!

Anyway... lots of words to say few things, but THANK YOU! Thank you squad, thank you community, I feel like a Kerbal now. And Hello !

Have a nice day (it's 10AM here) and fly safe!

Palleas

Welcome!

KSP is indeed one of the biggest things to hit the gaming world in a while, and it's also increasing the interest for space exploration in the younger generation which could only be a good thing

and it's also increasing the interest for space exploration in the younger generation which could only be a good thing

As long as they take more safety precautions than the average kerbal...

Welcome to the Kerbal forums, Palleas!

As long as they take more safety precautions than the average kerbal...

I disagree ! Less precautions = more missions, more rockets, more jobs, more heroes, more dreamers, more spinach !

"...more spinach!"

Yeah!

Welcome to the game and the Forums!
